_Due to the configured policy for accoun: Due to the configured policy for accounts, inactive accounts will be disabled after %n day.
Kutokana na sera iliyosanidiwa ya akaunti, akaunti ambazo hazitumiki zitazimwa baada ya siku %n.
Due to the configured policy for accounts, inactive accounts will be deleted after %n day.
Kutokana na sera iliyosanidiwa ya akaunti, akaunti ambazo hazitumiki zitafutwa baada ya siku %n.
translations.To keep your account you only need to lo: Ili kuhifadhi akaunti yako, unahitaji tu kuingia ukitumia kivinjari chako au uunganishe na kompyuta ya mezani au programu ya simu. Vinginevyo, akaunti yako na data yote iliyounganishwa itafutwa kabisa.
translations.If you have any questions, please contac: Ikiwa una maswali yoyote, tafadhali wasiliana na uongozi wako.
translations.Account retention (formerly User retenti: Uhifadhi wa akaunti (zamani uhifadhi wa Mtumiaji)
translations.Deletes accounts that did not login in t: Hufuta akaunti ambazo hazikuingia katika siku za mwisho.
translations.Accounts are deleted when they did not l:
Akaunti hufutwa wakati hazijaingia ndani ya idadi ya siku zilizotolewa. Hii pia itafuta faili zote na data nyingine zinazohusiana na akaunti.

* ðŸ›‚ Uhifadhi tofauti unaowezekana kwa akaunti za kawaida na akaunti za [programu ya wageni](https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/guests)
* â›” Ondoa akaunti kulingana na uanachama wa kikundi (chaguo-msingi: kikundi cha msimamizi)
* ðŸ”‘ Ondoa akaunti ambazo hazijaingia (chaguo-msingi: kuwezeshwa)
Akaunti hufutwa wakati hazijaingia ndani ya idadi ya siku zilizotolewa. Hii pia itafuta faili zote na data nyingine zinazohusiana na akaunti.
translations.Accounts from LDAP are deleted locally o: Akaunti kutoka LDAP hufutwa ndani ya nchi pekee, isipokuwa kama programu ya usaidizi wa uandishi wa LDAP imewashwa. Wakati bado inapatikana kwenye LDAP, akaunti zitaonekana tena.
translations.Ignore members of these groups from rete: Puuza washiriki wa vikundi hivi kutokana na kubaki
